content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore
content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. Pursuant to clause 8 of rule XX, the 
unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and 
pass the bill (H.R. 4031) to amend the Federal


Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Great Lakes Restoration 
Initiative, and for other purposes, on which the yeas and nays were 
ordered.

content.speaker: The Clerk
content.text: The Clerk read the title of the bill.

content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore
content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. The question is on the motion offered by the 
gentlewoman from California (Mrs. Napolitano) that the House suspend 
the rules and pass the bill.
  This is a 5-minute vote.

content.speaker: The RECORDER
content.text:
The vote was taken by electronic device, and there were--yeas 373, 
nays 45, not voting 11, as follows:

                             [Roll No. 36]

content.speaker: None

  So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and 
the bill was passed.
  The result of the vote was announced as above recorded.
  A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.

doc_title: GREAT LAKES RESTORATION INITIATIVE ACT OF 2019
title: GREAT LAKES RESTORATION INITIATIVE ACT OF 2019
